title: (Early Bird Mon) Morgan2 and The Free Item Dilemma + Hardy On Shotgunning Beers and  His 10 No. 1’s
itunes:title: (Early Bird Mon) Morgan2 and The Free Item Dilemma + Hardy On Shotgunning Beers and  His 10 No. 1’s
description:
This is the first half of the show for those who want it early! The full podcast will be posted after the rest of the live show ends. So you can listen to this now…or wait until you can have it all in one! Morgan2 has a dilemma with an employee giving her a free item at the grocery store. Hardy stops by to talk about his 10 no.1’s as a songwriter, the success he’s had in the last couple years and the part of his show where he shotguns beers and if it’s always legit or not.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
